scripts.say:
Hostile territory perimeter 
	Siren Threat Assessment Rating: 4
They didn't stage anything even resembling an organized attack...
Have we gotten really good, or did the Sirens just stop trying?
Don't make me keep saying it. Keep your guard up while we're in hostile territory.
But they're giving us the chance to take back territory they stole from us... Maybe that was always part of the plan, and that's why we prepared so much?
Uh, guys? My transceiver's bugging out on me... Anyone else getting a signal?
Hang on, lemme check... Oh, I knew it! Someone or something is jamming our comms!
Dammit! They must've lured us into a trap!
Enterprise, what do we do? Do we keep going, or pull out?
... We're pulling out. Our orders are not to take unnecessary risks, and to keep going forward would be one.
All ships, 180-degree turn! We're heading back to NY City!
